Package hospital.staff

Class TaskList

java.lang.Object
hospital.staff.TaskList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The TaskList class contains the list of the tasks that professionals can add to their each own personal task list. This class contains methods to manipulate the tasks. This feature is an optional extra.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • addTask

      public boolean addTask​(Task newTask)
      Adds a task to the personal task list. The list is sorted by initialised date afterwards.
      Parameters:
      newTask - - task to be added
      Returns:
      true/false whether the addition was successful

    • deleteTask

      public boolean deleteTask​(Task toDelete)
      Deletes a task from the personal task list.
      Parameters:
      toDelete - - task to delete
      Returns:
      True if the deletion was successful.

    • sortTasksByDueByDate

      public void sortTasksByDueByDate()
      Sorts tasks by due by date.

      Returns:
      the task list

    • setTaskList

      public void setTaskList​(java.util.List<Task> taskList)
      Setter method for the task list.
      Parameters:
      taskList - task list to be set

    • displayTaskList

      public void displayTaskList()
      Displays the task list.

    • findTask

      public Task findTask​(java.lang.String taskName)
      Finds a task in the task list
      Parameters:
      taskName - task to find
      Returns:
      task if found, null if not
